articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Eyimofe has been picked along with nine others on a shortlist of top films from Africa, Asia and Latin America by The Guardian of the UK.
articles.content:
Eyimofe (This Is My Desire), directed by twin brothers Arie Esiri and Chuko Esiri. Photograph: Everett Collection Inc/Alamy
Eyimofe, the multiple award-winning Nigerian feature film, has been picked… [+2164 chars]

articles.title: Showbiz veteran Jenny Tseng slams Li Jinglei for going too far in public divorce spat with Wang Leehom - AsiaOne
articles.description: Li Jinglei may have called for a truce on her and ex-husband Wang Leehom's very public spat over their divorce, but it seems the brouhaha has yet to die down. The 35-year-old's explosive posts after their divorce announcement on Dec 16 have not only tarnished…
articles.content:
Li Jinglei may have called for a truce on her and ex-husband Wang Leehom's very public spat over their divorce, but it seems the brouhaha has yet to die down.
